mapper.select: SELECT gno, gname, g.cano, c.cano, caname FROM goods g, category c WHERE g.cano = c.cano AND issell = 'Y' AND gname in (select gname from goods where SUBSTR(GNAME, 1, 2) like #{gname})
SELECT gno, gname, stock, gdetail, price FROM goods WHERE gno = 100001
SELECT cano, caname FROM category WHERE upno IS NULL
SELECT cano, caname FROM category WHERE #{cano} = upno
SELECT gno, gname, savename sname, dir, price FROM goods g, img i WHERE g.ino = i.ino AND dir = '/www/img/goods/' AND cano = #{cano}
